rules_text:
Reach, haste
[i]Get Behind Me![/i] – Whenever Alcryst, Tender Archer attacks, other creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
[i]Luna[/i] – Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, if they have greater toughness than the creature blocking them, the blocking creature gets -0/-X until end of turn, where X is the difference.
